title: Support tickets OCE
body: Whenever i try to submit a ticket to riot it tells me i need to login but when i login and put all my info in it automatically logs me out meaning i cant actually submit a ticket.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm not currently experiencing this issue and am able to log into the support site just fine, have you attempted logging in with a different browser? Or an incognito window in your current browser? Has this resolved your issue?
Thanks for replying, it randomly started working for me I'm not sure why but it is good :)

I'm getting the exact same issue as you. I tried DM'ing the @riotsupport twitter account multiple times, tried logging in with various accounts and even started a reddit thread. And still have not heard back from anybody.

Cmon Riot, I wanna play but to play i need to get an issue resolved. To get the issue resolved i need to be able to log into your site dammit.

It randomly started working for me, i clicked on look at my tickets or something and it let me log in that time.

Hope that helps at all...
